title: While on a morning walk last week, I encountered what I believe to be two coyotes in my neighborhood.  I live in the Monkey Junction area.  Has anyone else reported seeing a coyote recently?  I know they exist in Kure Beach.
text:
Here are a couple of links that answer your question.



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110801/ARTICLES/110809992?p=1&tc=pg



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20071112/NEWS/711120333
